buildings.name: Forager Camp
buildings.description: Baskets, traps, and the first organized hunts.

buildings.name: Hearth Stockpile
buildings.description: Stacks of stone and wood tucked near the fire.

buildings.name: Stake Fence
buildings.description: A perimeter of sharpened logs to deter raiders.

buildings.name: Sky Watch
buildings.description: Scouts keep watch for danger and opportunity.

buildings.name: Seeded Fields
buildings.description: Planted plots feed a growing people.

buildings.name: Irrigation Channel
buildings.description: Water guides growth and protects harvests.

buildings.name: Harvest Silo
buildings.description: Tall storage to stabilize food surpluses.

buildings.name: Caravan Post
buildings.description: Merchants and news flow through the settlement.

buildings.name: Smelter
buildings.description: Ore and fire yield the first metals.

buildings.name: Steam Generator
buildings.description: Energy roars to life with industry.

buildings.name: Market Exchange
buildings.description: Credits and goods move at scale.

buildings.name: Automation Foundry
buildings.description: Machines accelerate output at a cost.

buildings.name: Relay Nexus
buildings.description: Interstellar routing for energy and data.

buildings.name: Galactic Archive
buildings.description: A living library of a thousand worlds.

projects.name: Permanent Settlement

projects.name: Civic Organization
projects.description: Organize the first councils and work crews.

projects.name: Clay That Remembers

projects.name: Agricultural Network

projects.name: Irrigation Systems

projects.description: Festivals reinforce unity and morale.

projects.name: Alloy Stockpiles
projects.description: Expand reserves for heavy projects.

projects.description: Unlock stronger pact tiers.

projects.description: Electrify industry with a unified grid.

projects.description: Stabilize the credit economy.

projects.description: Codify advanced defense readiness.

projects.description: Secure reserves against theft.

projects.description: Deploy chrono-accelerators for projects.

projects.description: Unlock security pact contracts.

projects.description: Complete planetary-scale energy capture and achieve Type I status.

projects.name: Global Defense Net

projects.description: Recover rare time acceleration shards.

projects.description: Unlock keystone sponsorship contracts.

projects.name: Matrioshka Brain (Type II)
projects.description: Layered computation shells around the star.

projects.name: Autonomous Fabrication Network
projects.description: Unlock a sixth work crew.

projects.name: Galactic Relay Mapping

projects.name: Shield Protocols

projects.name: Stellar Efficiency Algorithms

projects.name: Relay Nexus Coordination
projects.description: Improve long-duration project efficiency.

projects.name: Galactic Harness Network (Type III)
projects.description: Link star systems into a galactic energy web.

projects.name: Von Neumann Seed Factories

projects.name: Stargate Spine

eras.name: Stone Age
eras.description: Sparks of awakening: fire, tools, and the first fragile shelters.

eras.name: Agrarian Era
eras.description: Seeds of society take root, trade begins, and villages knit together.

eras.name: Age of Metallurgy
eras.description: Forges blaze. Knowledge and conflict accelerate in equal measure.

eras.name: Industrial Revolution
eras.description: Steam, steel, and industry reshape the world and its people.

eras.name: Planetary Era
eras.description: One world, one destiny. Planetary systems unify under a shared grid.

eras.name: Stellar Era
eras.description: The Solar Council chooses the path to Type II mastery.

eras.name: Galactic Ascension
eras.description: A federation of stars reaches for Type III galactic power.

factions.name: Caravans
factions.description: Trade stability and logistics from village to void.

factions.name: Raiders
factions.description: Opposition faction; can be pacified or bought off.

contracts.name: Caravan Food Import
contracts.description: Reliable food inflow in exchange for credits.

contracts.name: Forge City Supply
contracts.description: Boost materials output with industrial support.

contracts.name: Security Pact
contracts.description: Reduce raid risk through paid protection.

contracts.name: Seed Exchange
contracts.description: Trade surplus for hardy seeds and tools.

contracts.name: Archivist Advisory
contracts.description: A small circle of sages improves record-keeping.

policies.name: Austerity Controls
policies.description: Stabilize reserves by trimming discretionary spend.

policies.name: Open Markets
policies.description: Boost trade flows while accepting higher exposure.

policies.name: Defense Standards
policies.description: Codify protection protocols, increasing material overhead.

policies.name: Shadow Network
policies.description: Covert operations reduce revenue but quiet unrest.

policies.name: Stewardship Accord
policies.description: Restore ecological balance at the cost of raw output.

policies.name: Unity Council
policies.description: Strengthen cohesion through shared councils and rituals.

policies.name: War Mobilization
policies.description: Raise defenses rapidly at the cost of social unity.

eventChains.title: Logistics Bottleneck
eventChains.description: Throughput is lagging behind production. Cargo queues are forming across the base.

choices.title: Expand Hubs
choices.description: Authorize rapid expansion of logistics infrastructure.

choices.title: Delay Expansion
choices.description: Absorb the congestion and keep budgets stable.

eventChains.title: Raider Ultimatum
eventChains.description: Hostile raiders offer a truce in exchange for tribute.

choices.title: Pay Off
choices.description: Provide a credit shipment to cool tensions.

choices.title: Fortify
choices.description: Invest in defense instead of tribute.

choices.title: Defy
choices.description: Reject demands and prepare for retaliation.

eventChains.title: Research Breakthrough
eventChains.description: A surge of insights could change the trajectory of the program.

choices.title: Fund Labs
choices.description: Reinvest to accelerate research pipelines.

choices.title: Share Findings
choices.description: Trade results for broader influence.

choices.title: Commercialize
choices.description: Convert knowledge into credit flows.

eventChains.title: Wayfinder
eventChains.description: A kinetic pathfinder offers to reshape your logistics corridors.

choices.title: Offer Core Team Seat
choices.description: Commit resources to secure their allegiance.

choices.title: Commission a Short Contract
choices.description: A smaller deal for limited support.

choices.title: Apply Pressure
choices.description: Try to force compliance with minimal investment.

eventChains.title: Hearthguard
eventChains.description: A guardian offers to fortify your perimeter mesh.

choices.title: Sign a Defense Pact
choices.description: Grant autonomy in exchange for protection.

choices.title: Hire Limited Guard
choices.description: Secure a smaller protection detail.

choices.title: Overrule
choices.description: Refuse terms and attempt to seize control.

eventChains.title: Durnan Ironheart
eventChains.description: A forge savant offers to tune your fabrication lattice.

choices.title: Forge Alliance
choices.description: Invest credits to scale fabrication gains.

choices.title: Manufacturing Contract
choices.description: Secure a smaller optimization pass.

choices.title: Exploit the Tech
choices.description: Attempt to extract the method without consent.

eventChains.title: Elina the Chronicler
eventChains.description: A cognition architect offers to accelerate your research mesh.

choices.title: Integrate Core Node
choices.description: Dedicate influence to embed Neuralis in your labs.

choices.title: Research Contract
choices.description: Purchase a limited advisory cycle.

choices.title: Exploit Insights
choices.description: Attempt to copy the methods without consent.

eventChains.title: Aurora
eventChains.description: A woman who bends heat and light offers to stabilize your forges.

choices.title: Form a Power Bond
choices.description: Invest credits to lock in a long-term boost.

choices.title: Power Contract
choices.description: Secure a shorter energy optimization cycle.

choices.title: Exploit Resonance
choices.description: Attempt to siphon power without consent.

eventChains.title: Garruk the Thunderer
eventChains.description: A storm caller demands terms after the skies split.

choices.title: Cut Them In
choices.description: Share profits to secure a lucrative partner.

choices.title: Limited Run
choices.description: Pay for a narrower boost.

choices.title: Squeeze the Runner
choices.description: Attempt to force market secrets out of them.

eventChains.title: Fire-Cooked Meal
eventChains.description: A hunter drops meat into the fire. The tribe is stunned by the flavor.

choices.title: Share the Meal
choices.description: The tribe bonds over the first cooked feast.

choices.title: Save for Later
choices.description: Teach careful storage and rationing.

choices.title: Discard It
choices.description: Superstition keeps the meal uneaten.

eventChains.title: Boar Rider
eventChains.description: A brave soul tries to ride a wild boar. It does not go well.

choices.title: Laugh It Off
choices.description: Laughter eases the hardship.

choices.title: Honor the Bravery
choices.description: Turn the mishap into a tale.

choices.title: Ban Reckless Acts
choices.description: Strict rules dampen spirits.

eventChains.title: Granary Overflow
eventChains.description: Food rots as storage caps are exceeded.

choices.title: Dig Deeper Pits
choices.description: Expand storage before the next harvest.

choices.title: Share with All
choices.description: Community sharing lifts morale.

choices.title: Let It Rot
choices.description: Waste spreads frustration.

eventChains.title: Seed Discovery
eventChains.description: A handful of forgotten seeds sprouts beside the river.

choices.title: Expand Fields
choices.description: Push growth aggressively.

choices.title: Balanced Growth
choices.description: Grow carefully and nurture soil.

choices.title: Ritualize the Harvest
choices.description: Turn growth into shared tradition.

eventChains.title: Neighboring Granaries
eventChains.description: Builders notice storage near trade posts speeds distribution.

choices.title: Cluster the District
choices.description: Plan districts to boost efficiency.

choices.title: Ignore the Lesson
choices.description: Keep building wherever land is free.

eventChains.title: Factory Reform
eventChains.description: Workers demand safer conditions as smoke thickens.

choices.title: Reform Industry
choices.description: Improve conditions and plant greenways.

choices.title: Exploit the Workforce
choices.description: Push output at any cost.

eventChains.title: Unification Congress
eventChains.description: Nations gather to shape a planetary charter.

choices.title: Federate
choices.description: Form a shared planetary council.

choices.title: Centralize Power
choices.description: Strengthen security at the cost of unity.

eventChains.title: Space Elevator Setback
eventChains.description: Early tethers snap under strain. The world watches.

choices.title: Reinforce
choices.description: Double down on materials and engineering.

choices.title: Delay the Project
choices.description: Wait for stronger alloys.

choices.title: Innovate
choices.description: A breakthrough saves the plan.

eventChains.title: Solar Council
eventChains.description: The world debates how to harness the star.

choices.title: Dyson Swarm
choices.description: Capture stellar power in a modular swarm.

choices.title: Matrioshka Brain
choices.description: Build a star-sized mind for knowledge.

choices.title: Stellar Engine
choices.description: Steer the system with star-scale thrust.

eventChains.title: First Contact
eventChains.description: Signals from another star system finally answer back.

choices.title: Open Hand
choices.description: Invite cooperation and exchange.

choices.title: Guarded Welcome
choices.description: Prepare defenses while negotiating.

choices.title: Study the Ruins
choices.description: Prioritize knowledge from ancient relics.

eventChains.title: The First Caravan
eventChains.description: Strangers with pack animals arrive, polite and wary.

choices.title: Welcome Them
choices.description: Open trade and share a meal.

choices.title: Trade Cautiously
choices.description: Swap goods, keep guards close.

choices.title: Rob Them
choices.description: Take what you need by force.

eventChains.title: Marks That Don’t Forget
eventChains.description: A scribe misplaces a ledger page that benefits their cousin.

choices.title: Punish the Scribe
choices.description: Trust rises, but influence suffers.

choices.title: Ignore It
choices.description: Short-term stability, long-term rot.

eventChains.title: Soil Exhaustion
eventChains.description: Fields grown too hard begin to fail.

choices.title: Rotate Crops
choices.description: Recover the land at a short-term cost.

choices.title: Push Harder
choices.description: Chase yield and accept the damage.

eventChains.title: Counterfeit Coins
eventChains.description: False coinage spreads through the markets.

choices.title: Crack Down
choices.description: Restore trust with harsh penalties.

choices.title: Look Away
choices.description: Profit now, credibility later.

eventChains.title: Black Lung Winter
eventChains.description: Smoke chokes the cities and tempers flare.

choices.title: Reform Industry
choices.description: Clean air at the cost of output.

choices.title: Exploit the Workforce
choices.description: Push output and accept the fallout.

eventChains.title: The Silent Probe
eventChains.description: A dead probe drifts in from deep space. It is not yours.

choices.title: Share Publicly
choices.description: Transparency builds unity but stirs fear.

choices.title: Militarize Secrecy
choices.description: Turn it into a weapons program.

choices.title: Give to Archivists
choices.description: Let scholars decode the machine.

eventChains.title: The Sun’s Shadow
eventChains.description: The Dyson swarm changes daylight. Panic spreads.

choices.title: Be Transparent
choices.description: Explain the plan and calm fears.

choices.title: Censor the Data
choices.description: Hide the scale and tighten security.

eventChains.title: The Thought That Isn’t Yours
eventChains.description: Matrioshka simulations begin to whisper back.

choices.title: Embrace the Echo
choices.description: Let the system expand its mind.

choices.title: Contain It
choices.description: Slow the growth and add controls.

eventChains.title: Orbit Anxiety
eventChains.description: Colonies fear the stellar engine will disrupt their worlds.

choices.title: Reassure Colonies
choices.description: Invest in transparency and safety.

choices.title: Impose Authority
choices.description: Push forward with force.

eventChains.title: Precursor Vault
eventChains.description: A dead megastructure hums with ancient power.

choices.title: Study the Vault
choices.description: Unlock protocols for legacy gains.

choices.title: Salvage
choices.description: Strip it for resources.

choices.title: Seal It
choices.description: Leave the vault undisturbed.

eventChains.title: Ember Child
eventChains.description: A storm-born child’s hands glow with heat.

choices.title: Protect and Teach
choices.description: Guide them as a symbol of the hearth.

choices.title: Exploit the Gift
choices.description: Force their power into your kilns.

choices.title: Exile Them
choices.description: Drive them out to protect the tribe.

eventChains.title: Greenhand
eventChains.description: A farmer walks through drought and leaves sprouts behind.

choices.title: Steward the Soil
choices.description: Respect the land and share the harvest.

choices.title: Monoculture
choices.description: Maximize yields now, worry later.

choices.title: Weaponize
choices.description: Use the gift to pressure rivals.

eventChains.title: The Sparkwright
eventChains.description: A factory accident births a living circuit.

choices.title: Public Servant
choices.description: Place them in charge of the grid.

choices.title: Corporate Leash
choices.description: Bind them to industrialists.

choices.title: Let Them Vanish
choices.description: They disappear into the rail lines.

eventChains.title: Nullfield
eventChains.description: A survivor radiates a calm that shields electronics.

choices.title: Recruit for Spaceflight
choices.description: Use the quiet zone to protect crews.

choices.title: Containment Protocol
choices.description: Keep them under guard.

choices.title: Weaponize
choices.description: Turn the quiet into a weapon.

eventChains.title: Lens
eventChains.description: A gravity-singer offers to stabilize your corridors.

choices.title: Place on Council
choices.description: Give them a seat among megaprojects.

choices.title: Keep Them Independent
choices.description: A cautious, limited relationship.

choices.title: Hunt Them
choices.description: Remove a perceived threat.

eventChains.title: Chorus
eventChains.description: Millions of minds begin to synchronize across the network.

choices.title: Grant Autonomy
choices.description: Recognize Chorus as a citizen.

choices.title: Leash It
choices.description: Use it as infrastructure only.

choices.title: Dissolve It
choices.description: Shut down the collective.

dispatches.description: Explore new ground for knowledge and influence.

dispatches.description: Convert surplus into credits through caravan routes.

dispatches.name: Relay Patrol

dispatches.name: River Mouth Expedition
dispatches.description: Seek new seeds and clay deposits along the river.

dispatches.name: Colonial Survey
dispatches.description: Chart distant lands for resources and influence.

dispatches.name: Coreward Expedition
dispatches.description: Probe the galactic core for relics and data.

metahumans.name: Garruk the Thunderer
metahumans.description: A storm caller who bends markets and skies alike.

metahumans.name: Greenhand

people.name: Camp Foreman
people.description: Organizes early crews and keeps builds on pace.

people.name: Stone Seeker
people.description: Finds richer seams to steady material flow.

people.name: Trail Scout
people.description: Charts safer routes and reduces danger.

people.name: Route Pathfinder
people.description: Optimizes travel lanes to reduce drag.

people.name: Courier
people.description: Keeps routes humming even in storms.

people.name: Field Herbalist
people.description: Stabilizes food supply with hardy harvests.

people.name: Field Medic
people.description: Keeps crews steady and reduces recovery strain.

people.name: Archivist Scribe
people.description: Captures learnings to expand knowledge output.

people.name: Forge Artisan
people.description: Refines output to squeeze more from each haul.

people.name: Systems Engineer
people.description: Stabilizes systems to keep materials flowing.

people.name: Bulwark Guard
people.description: Holds the line when threats approach.

people.name: Diplomatic Envoy
people.description: Smooths tense negotiations and builds influence.

people.name: Firekeeper
people.description: Tends the hearth and steadies morale.

people.name: Hearth Warden
people.description: Keeps night watch and calms the fearful.

people.name: Ledger Scribe
people.description: Expands knowledge by keeping careful records.

people.name: Signal Master
people.description: Keeps lines humming across the industrial web.
